body_html:
I'm not sure why GitHub suggested me for this -- maybe because I reviewed some other Dimension code recently in #17545.

But I'm also not confident to review this. I did not write or review any of the other Dimension/TensorShape related code.

It seems plausible to me that maintaining dimension identity is a feature, not a bug. That way two tensors derived from the same original tensor will reuse the same logical dimension.

body:
I'm not sure why GitHub suggested me for this -- maybe because I reviewed some other Dimension code recently in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/17545.

But I'm also not confident to review this. I did not write or review any of the other Dimension/TensorShape related code.

It seems plausible to me that maintaining dimension identity is a feature, not a bug. That way two tensors derived from the same original tensor will reuse the same logical dimension.
